Re ''Grandma Cooks, They Deliver'' (Business Day, May 29):

For the delivery men known as dabbawallas to deliver cooked meals on time to the correct individual without fail in a metropolis like Mumbai with some 18 million inhabitants and incredible traffic jams is a modern-day miracle in ultimate efficiency and unique to Mumbai.
It is a lesson in organization capability with old-fashioned dedication that surpasses any modern method of communications.
I was once a resident of Mumbai and always thought, If only our government would take a clue from the dabbawallas.
